title: Apple Says iOS 14.5 Will Be Released 'Next Week'
content:
Apple today in a press release about its new AirTag tracker announced that iOS 14.5 and iPadOS 14.5 will be available starting "next week."


iOS 14.5 and iPadOS 14.5 are packed with new features, including the ability for iPhone users who are wearing an Apple Watch to unlock the iPhone with Face ID while wearing a mask. iOS 14.5 and iPadOS 14.5 will also be the minimum software versions required for the just-announced AirTag item tracker, according to Apple.

iOS 14.5 will be preinstalled on the new purple versions of the iPhone 12 and iPhone 12 mini that are available to pre-order starting this Friday.
Related Roundups: iOS 14, iPadOS 14

This article, "Apple Says iOS 14.5 Will Be Released 'Next Week'" first appeared on MacRumors.com
